reviews.review_msg: Luca is fantastic! Some of the texts in this course were a little dense, but overall great readings and the midterm was open book. Love when he goes on a tangent and looks like the Pepe Silvia meme. He's always hilarious and likes to connect with his students. I'm not a WL major, but I hope I can take a class with him again at some point!

Luca was so sweet and forced us to rlly go out of our comfort zone and talk in class. He encouraged questions and rlly gave each student attention. The group oral presentation was marked pretty easily and he was lenient with papers, providing lots of great feedback. Overall a rlly fun course!

amazing prof that made me love literature again. late review, but i took this course in fall 2023 when the topic was ancient literature. dr. oluic combines history, pop culture, and modern events when analyzing texts which i thought was very cool. he creates a friendly environment for his students. amazing and funny guy would take again 1000%

Luca is an awesome professor. He looks like a watch model or something. Generous with marking. Gets you to improve your essay-writing skills. There was a group project when I took his class, but it's pretty simple. Do what you can to pick out interesting points in the reading materials and you should be fine. Pretty typical 100 level English course
Do not take her course. Very terrible. She doesn't give useful feedback. Grading criteria are not clear.
Love her, she's super funny and her classes are so enjoyable, but she expects a lot from you and won't give an easy A to anyone... and don't get on her bad side

Really difficult for a 100 level course, don't expect this course to be a GPA booster or a breeze. But you'll definitely learn a lot and she's super encouraging and helpful. She teaches really good writing skills, and it's definitely a hard class but so definitely worth it!
Very nice personality, generally very chill and the class itself is a lot of fun. however there is a lot of work to be done, and she can be very picky about how you write.
